title: Google scraps controversial Web Environment Integrity API
description:
Google has officially scrapped its controversial Web Environment Integrity API proposal, which was likened to digital rights management (DRM) for the open web. The API, which was at the proposal stage, aimed to allow websites to verify the authenticity of users and their devices or browsers. Google’s intentions behind this initiative were to enhance user... Read more »

The post Google scraps controversial Web Environment Integrity API appeared first on Developer Tech News.
